metadata.Title: CVE-2016-4855 on Ubuntu 20.04 ESM (focal) - negligible.
metadata.Description:
Cross-site scripting vulnerability in ADOdb versions prior to 5.20.6 allows remote attackers to inject arbitrary web script or HTML via unspecified vectors.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2016-4855` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

libphp-adodb - 5.20.6-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: libphp-adodb package in focal, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '5.20.6-1').
